heroDescription: A modern platform for writers, developers, and creators to share their knowledge, build their audience, and connect with like-minded individuals.
featuresSubtitle: Discover the powerful features that make Medium-ish the perfect platform for content creators
writeDescription: Create beautiful articles with our rich text editor. Share your knowledge, experiences, and insights with the world.
profileDescription: Showcase your expertise, connect with followers, and build your personal brand in the developer community.
discoverDescription: Explore articles from talented writers, learn new skills, and stay updated with the latest trends in technology.
ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of creators who are already sharing their knowledge on Medium-ish
